name: Against The Dawn 3D (WebGL)
description:
The game is about zombie apocalyptic world where the player needs to "find" the correct road between 7-8 different roads and to reach the finish line and find the cave where the game will end. You need to avoid obstacles (Cars, Bridges, Lampposts etc.) because colliding with the obstacles will cause you lose health!! Save your health, FIGHT AND FIND your way out from this ZOMBIE APOCALYPTIC world!!

(This is in development stage,for game jam we made it quickly,Full release will be much better with tons of new features)
